column1: Host header poisoning in email generation
column2: Using the HTTP Host header to construct a link in an email can facilitate phishing attacks and leak password reset tokens.
column4: Links in this email can be hijacked by poisoning the [["HTTP host header"|"relative:///VulnFinder-CodeQL-main/src/javascript-cwe/CWE-640/examples/HostHeaderPoisoningInEmailGeneration.js:17:47:17:54"]].
